ComponentCard State Machine

Overview

Quick action: View code

Component States

Logical States

isHoveredFalse

  • Description: isHovered is false
  • Triggers: setIsHovered(false)
  • CSS Classes: scale-105 z-10 border-blue-400 shadow-lg border-dashed translate-y-0
  • Props: {"isHovered":false}

isHoveredTrue

  • Description: isHovered is true
  • Triggers: setIsHovered(true)
  • CSS Classes: scale-105 z-10 border-blue-400 shadow-lg border-dashed translate-y-0
  • Props: {"isHovered":true}

CSS States & Styling

default

borderColor: var(--color-border);
backgroundColor: var(--color-background);
color: var(--color-text-primary);

Classes: border rounded-lg px-4 py-2
Pseudo-states: :hover, :focus, :active

hover

borderColor: var(--color-border-hover);
transform: translateY(-1px);

Classes: hover:bg-gray-50 hover:border-gray-300
Pseudo-states: :hover

focus

borderColor: var(--color-primary);
borderWidth: 2px;

Classes: focus:border-dashed focus:border-2 focus:border-blue-500
Pseudo-states: :focus, :focus-visible

State Transitions

    isHoveredFalse : isHovered is false
    isHoveredTrue : isHovered is true
    any --> new_state : MouseEnter
    any --> new_state : MouseLeave
    [*] --> default

    default --> focus : tab/click

    loading --> default : action complete

CSS Custom Properties

Following InternetFriends design system:

:root {
  --color-primary: #3b82f6;
  --color-border: #e5e7eb;
  --color-border-hover: #d1d5db;
  --color-background: #ffffff;
  --color-background-hover: #f9fafb;
  --color-text-primary: #111827;
}

Focus States

InternetFriends style focus states use 2px dashed borders:

.component:focus-visible {
  border: 2px dashed var(--color-primary);
  outline: none;
}

Animation Transitions

.component {
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
}

Usage Examples

// Default state
<ComponentCard />

// Loading state
<ComponentCard loading />

// Error state
<ComponentCard error="Something went wrong" />

// Success state
<ComponentCard success />

Testing States

// Test all states
describe('ComponentCard States', () => {
  it('renders default state', () => {
    render(<ComponentCard />);
  });
  
  it('renders loading state', () => {
    render(<ComponentCard loading />);
  });
  
  it('handles error state', () => {
    render(<ComponentCard error="Test error" />);
  });
});
